name: Geometry Wars (MeraalMathar)
description:
Can you overcome all odds and beat the plague of Capsules hell bent on taking over your quantum Planks. Use your Fast paced striking and beat all 3 levels to save your sanity.?

Geometry Wars

A top down shooter game developed by Kayhos Studios(Salaar Zahid,Meraal Mathar , Shayan Kazmi).We wanted to create a top down shooter game and mix it with aspects of retro cyber punk themes and an engaging story line.The prototype is fairly simple since we were working with a deadline.At the start of the project we really wanted to develop thematic aspects of the game and managed to create an atmosphere that was cohesive with our initial vision. The game is under development we'd hope to add more levels , and improve on the gameplay and pacing .

enjoy!

KayhosStudios

Game Developers : Salaar Zahid,Meraal Mathar , Shayan Kazmi

Game Programming :Salaar Zahid

Level Design :Salaar Zahid,Meraal Mathar

UI design :Shayan Kazmi

Game Artist: Meraal Mathar
